Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its worth to you, I propose a special introductory offer of $11500 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only the high quality and functionality of the product but also the unique opportunity for you to secure it at a favorable rate. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
